meanings.definition: A high-performance aircraft capable of flying at extremely fast speeds.
meanings.sent1: The superplanes soared through the sky with incredible speed.
meanings.sent2: The military invested in advanced superplanes for their air force.
meanings.sent3: The superplanes had a race to see who could reach the clouds first.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took flight like superplanes, reaching new heights every day.
meanings.sent5: The superplanes left a trail of awe and wonder wherever they flew.

meanings.definition: To surpass or exceed in terms of speed or performance.
meanings.sent1: The new sports car seemed to superplanes past all the others on the track.
meanings.sent2: She hoped her hard work would superplanes her previous achievements.
meanings.sent3: The student tried to superplanes his classmates in the science fair project.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed allowed him to superplanes all obstacles in his way.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's dedication and training helped him superplanes his own records.
